author: María López
title: Peligran las procesiones de Semana Santa en Castilla-La Mancha: el pronóstico de la AEMET
text:
La Semana Santa arrancará en Castilla-La Mancha con temperaturas por encima de lo normal para esta época del año. Sin embargo, conforme avancen los días se producirá un cambio brusco, con precipitaciones y un descenso de los termómetros desde el próximo lunes.
Así lo ha avanzado este viernes la delegada territorial de la Agencia Estatal de Meteorología (AEMET), Eroteida Sánchez , que ha comparecido en rueda de prensa junto a la delegada del Gobierno de España en Castilla-La Mancha, Milagros Tolón , para presentar el informe sobre el invierno meteorológico de la región, el avance para la primavera y la predicción para la Semana Santa.
Sánchez ha indicado que durante el sábado y el domingo continuará la situación de invervalos nubosos, con temperaturas que seguirán siendo agradables -de 23 o 25 grados-, pero el panorama cambiará completamente a partir del lunes . Ese día empezarán a bajar las temperaturas y habrá lluvias generalizadas con alguna tormenta.
[Aemet confirma las peores previsiones para Semana Santa: los días y zonas en los que lloverá en España]
Según ha informado, la temperaturas seguirán bajando el martes, también con precipitaciones generalizadas . Además, aparecerá la nieve en los sistemas montañosos. El miércoles continuarán las lluvias y aparecerán vientos más fuertes.
Predicción para el jueves, viernes y sábado Para el jueves, viernes y sábado , tal y como ha señalado Sánchez, la península seguirá bajo la influencia de bajas presiones, pero las temperaturas "se templarán". Aún así, la delegada territorial de la AEMET ha advertido de que seguirán las precipitaciones , que "nos podrían estropear las procesiones".
No obstante, ha recordado que "siempre hay que tener en cuenta la incertidumbre" y que cuanto más se acercan los días más puede variar la predicción meteorológica.
La primavera será cálida Por otro lado, respecto al avance para la primavera, Sánchez ha indicado que hay una "alta probabilidad" (60-70 %) de que la temperatura sea superior a la normal en el trimestre de abril, mayo y junio en toda la comunidad.
En cuanto al balance del invierno , tanto la delegada de la AEMET como la delegada del Gobierno han indicado que ha sido "el segundo más cálido desde que se tienen registros" , con una temperatura media de 7,8 grados.
Con respecto a las precipitaciones, la media del invierno en la región ha sido de 127 litros por metro cuadrado, lo que se califica como un "periodo húmedo" , pero ha habido diferencias entre unas provincias y otras, ya que en Albacete ha sido mucho más seco que en el resto de la comunidad.

author: AOL Staff
title: Crystal Hefner Says Hugh Hefner Wouldn’t Have Survived #MeToo Movement
text: Crystal Hefner Says Hugh Hefner Wouldn’t Have Survived #MeToo Movement [Crystal Hefner](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/crystal-harris/) says late husband [Hugh Hefner](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrities/hugh-hefner/) would “absolutely not” have made it through the [#MeToo movement](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/lucy-hale-on-metoo-movement-weve-all-had-our-experiences/). “’I’ve thought about this because #MeToo happened, literally, a month after he passed away,” she told the [Daily Mail](https://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/article-13001841/crystal-hefner-hugh-died-just-time-not-survive-metoo-movement.html) on Wednesday, January 24. “He left Earth just in time.” Hugh [died in September 2017](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/hugh-hefner-dead-playboy-founder-dies-at-91/) at age 91, just one month before sexual abuse allegations against Harvey Weinstein went public and kicked off a movement of women sharing their experiences with sexual violence. (Weinstein, 71, is [currently in prison](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/harvey-weinstein-receives-16-year-sentence-after-rape-conviction/) after being found guilty on charges of rape and assault.) Hugh founded Playboy magazine in 1953. The publication eventually expanded to a complete brand, including the Playboy Bunnies and their residence in the Playboy Mansion. While Hollywood may appear to be all glitz and glam on the surface, the industry has seen its fair share of scandals through the years. The New York Times and the New Yorker first published investigative pieces in 2017 that accused disgruntled movie producer Harvey Weinstein of decades of sexual assault and harassment. Soon after, Weinstein stood trial and was […] “I feel that the mansion was so unique and couldn’t be replicated,” Crystal continued. “It was like this weird social experiment at its time, but I don’t know how he would have held up during the #MeToo.” While [various former Playboy Bunnies](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/pictures/every-former-playmate-whos-spoken-out-against-hugh-hefner/) — including Crystal — have spoken candidly about their experiences in the mansion, Crystal made it clear that she “never saw [Hef] as, like, a predator.” That being said, she admitted to being “afraid” of having sex with Hugh alone. “He was used to some kind of show, some kind of circus up there,” Crystal told the Daily Mail, referring to his bedroom. “So, like, just me? That’s not enough. It’s easy to feel not enough there.” Crystal met Hugh during a Halloween party hosted at the mansion in 2008 when she was 21. She moved into the Los Angeles home shortly thereafter, and on Christmas Eve in 2010, Hugh gave her a ring as a proposal. They briefly split before ultimately walking down the aisle on New Year’s Eve in 2012. The two were still married when Hugh died five years later. Crystal Hefner didn’t hold back when it came to addressing her decade-long stint as a Playboy Bunny in her new book, Only Say Good Things: Surviving Playboy and Finding Myself. “Life in the mansion wasn’t the fairy tale I had once hoped it would be,” Hefner, 37, wrote in her memoir, which was released on […] On Tuesday, January 23, [Crystal released her memoir](https://www.usmagazine.com/celebrity-news/news/crystal-hefner-teases-memoir-about-playboy-mansion-no-one-is-safe/), Only Say Good Things: Surviving Playboy and Finding Myself, which offered a detailed look at her life as a Playboy Bunny. “Life in the mansion wasn’t the fairy tale I had once hoped it would be,” she wrote. “From the outside, sure, it had all the trappings of a fairy tale. But it wasn’t, and everyone who lived there knew it.” When detailing her and Hugh’s marriage, Crystal admitted she was “never in love” with the media mogul. “I loved this old man in the ways you are supposed to love your elders,” she continued. “In the ways you are supposed to love someone who is nearing the end of a long and complicated life.”

author: Sabinna Pierre
title: Oregon babies poisoned by lead in recalled Target baby food | kgw.com
text:
OREGON, USA — Oregon health officials are urging parents and caregivers to avoid a recalled baby food after two cases of lead poisoning were detected in the state, according to a statement from the Oregon Health Authority (OHA).
OHA reported Wednesday that "two cases of elevated blood lead levels in babies were detected in Oregon" and that "during interviews with the families, investigators determined the children consumed the flavor affected by the recall."
The cases involve Good & Gather Baby Pea, Zucchini and Kale Thyme Vegetable Puree, which were recalled in March by the U.S. Food & Drug Administration. OHA said "the cases followed a recall alert in March of more than 25,000 packages" of the baby food sold in 4-ounce containers.
Good & Gather is a Target store brand, and according to the Oregon Health Authority, "the product was sold nationwide at the company's stores." The FDA has classified the recall as a Class II event, which the health authority said "means that use of or exposure to this product 'may cause temporary or medically reversible adverse health consequences,' but the probability of serious health impacts is low."
While the FDA recall is considered "terminated," OHA warned that "the product has a best use date of December 2025, so there may be families with the product still in their homes."
OHA's Childhood Lead Poisoning Prevention Program Coordinator Ryan Barker, emphasized the particular danger lead poses to young children.
"While lead is toxic for all people regardless of age, small children are especially at risk because they're still growing and developing," said Barker. "Continued exposure over time can permanently damage their central nervous system, which may result in long-term health problems, such as learning disorders, impaired speech and brain damage."
OHA noted that lead is of special concern for babies, toddlers and children because even small amounts of lead may affect behavior, cognitive development and academic achievement, according to the American Academy of Pediatrics.
Health officials warned that lead poisoning symptoms can be difficult to identify. OHA said "signs of lead poisoning are not always easy to see and can be mistaken for other illnesses" and that "without a blood test, lead poisoning may go undiagnosed, especially since affected children often don't look or act sick."
Possible symptoms according to OHA include:
- Tiredness or loss of energy
- Hyperactivity
- Reduced attention span
- Irritability or crankiness
- Poor appetite
- Weight loss
- Trouble sleeping
- Constipation
- Stomach aches or pains
The health authority reported that last year Oregon had 361 lead poisoning cases in children, with 237 affecting children younger than 6. The agency said that while "the most common cases are due to ingesting paint and paint dust containing lead," exposures from "traditional cosmetics, glazed pottery, and informally imported spices have been identified."
Oregon health care providers and laboratories are required by law to report elevated and non-elevated lead test results to local health departments or the Oregon Health Authority.
topics: Economy, Business and Finance->product and services news

author: Gazzetta di Mantova
title: Bufera sul partner sciamano della principessa norvegese Martha - Gazzetta di Mantova
text: Bufera sul partner sciamano della principessa norvegese Martha Offre consigli su come affrontare suicidio causato da 'spirito' STOCCOLMA, 29 DIC - Durek Verrett, il compagno sciamano della principessa norvegese Märtha Louise, figlia del re Harald V, ha suscitato accese polemiche dopo aver pubblicato un video sul suo profilo Instagram in cui offre consigli su come affrontare "lo spirito suicida". Nel video, pubblicato ieri, Verrett ammette che si tratta di un argomento delicato e prosegue dando i suoi consigli da sciamano su come scacciare lo spirito. Le affermazioni hanno suscitato reazioni da parte di diverse persone, tra cui Petter Eide dell'associazione 'Leve', che fornisce supporto ai chi ha tentato di togliersi la vita: "Sostiene che il suicidio sia causato da uno spirito che si è insediato nel corpo e che possa essere scacciato usando la forza mentale." ha affermato Eide al quotidiano norvegese VG. "Non riesco a esprimere quanto mi sconvolga sentire queste sciocchezze. Sta giocando con la vita delle persone", ha aggiunto. Secondo l'Istituto di Sanità Norvegese, oltre 600 persone si tolgono la vita ogni anno in Norvegia, un dato significativo per un Paese con una popolazione di 5,5 milioni di abitanti. A confronto, il numero annuale di vittime per incidenti stradali si aggira intorno alle 100 persone. (ANSA).

author: Redação
title: Papa Francisco é hospitalizado para tratamento de bronquite, diz Vaticano
text:
Papa Francisco é hospitalizado para tratamento de bronquite, diz Vaticano
Pontífice foi diagnosticado com a doença em 6 de fevereiro
O Papa Francisco foi internado na manhã desta sexta-feira (14) para fazer exames e tratar uma bronquite, segundo confirmou o Vaticano. Em nota à imprensa, o Estado eclesiástico afirmou que o pontífice ficará sob cuidados médicos na Policlínica Agostino Gemelli.
"Nesta manhã, após suas audiências, o Papa Francisco será internado na Policlínica Agostino Gemelli para os exames diagnósticos necessários e para continuar o tratamento hospitalar para sua bronquite em curso”, diz o comunicado.
Veja também
Com 88 anos, Francisco enfrentou dificuldades nos últimos dias para realizar atividades diárias por conta da condição, confirmada pelo Vaticano em 6 de fevereiro.
Nessa semana, ele chegou a pedir que assessores lessem alguns de seus discursos durante audiências. "Deixe-me pedir ao padre que continue lendo porque ainda não posso com minha bronquite. Espero que, da próxima vez, eu possa", expressou o pontífice, em uma das ocasiões.
Problemas de saúde
O jesuíta, eleito papa em 2013, sofreu vários problemas de saúde nos últimos anos, incluindo dores nos joelhos e quadris, inflamação do cólon e uma operação de hérnia.
Francisco, que teve uma parte de um dos pulmões removida quando era jovem, foi hospitalizado durante três dias em 2023 devido a uma bronquite, tratada com antibióticos.

author: Alberta Cobb
title: What does purple mean on road conditions?
text:
What does purple mean on road conditions?
Purple on road conditions indicates that travel is not advised. The roadway has deteriorated to the point where it is very dangerous to travel. Emergency vehicles and snowplows may be called off of the road due to the conditions, making it difficult for them to reach the scene in case of an emergency.
What does a purple road mean on a map?
A purple road on a map signifies “travel not advised.” It indicates that the road has deteriorated and is very dangerous to travel. Emergency vehicles and snowplows may be unable to access the road due to the poor conditions, making it challenging to respond to emergencies in that area.
What do the different color roads on Waze mean?
Waze uses color coding to depict different road conditions. Green represents “Free Flow” and indicates great conditions where cars are able to move at the speed limit. Yellow signifies “Light Traffic” and indicates slight congestion, but drivers can still travel at relative speeds. Light red denotes “Moderate Traffic,” which means congestion is starting to build up noticeably.
What is the Army Amber Road condition?
The Army Amber Road condition represents mild to severe conditions on the road. It is used to alert drivers to exercise caution. Amber conditions may include reduced visibility, slush, several inches of packed snow, and black ice.
What does pink mean on MN 511?
On MN 511, pink represents that the road is completely covered. This indicates that the road is not safe for travel and may require additional caution or alternative routes. Blue signifies partial coverage, while green represents normal road conditions.
Have you seen purple streetlights on the highway? The Department of Transportation explains why
There is no specific information about purple streetlights on the highway in the provided content.
What do road colors mean?
On maps, different colors are used to represent various road conditions. Green typically signifies dry conditions, while light blue represents wet conditions. Purple indicates that travel is not advised due to extremely dangerous road conditions.
What do line colors mean on the road?
Different line colors on the road indicate different instructions or restrictions. A solid yellow line indicates no passing, while a dashed yellow line allows passing. White lines separate lanes traveling in the same direction, while a double white line prohibits lane changes. A single white line discourages lane changes.
Why is my Waze purple?
If your Waze route appears purple, it is the default color for the route. However, it may change to green if you have sent an ETA to someone, indicating that your route is being tracked by someone else.
Why are roads different colors?
Roads can be different colors due to the materials used in their construction. For example, asphalt comes in different colors depending on the type and amount of aggregate used in the mix, as well as the amount of bitumen, a black sticky substance, used as the binding agent.
What do colors mean on maps?
On maps, different colors are used to symbolize various features or elements. Blue is used for bodies of water, highways, and borders. Red indicates major highways, roads, urban areas, airports, and military sites. Yellow typically represents built-up or urban areas.
What are the purple lines on a weather map?
On a weather map, purple lines often represent occluded fronts. These indicate that a weather system has reached its mature stage and is decaying. Purple lines with alternating triangles and half-moons denote occluded fronts, where a cold air mass is moving faster than a cool air mass.
What does purple mean on a snow map?
On a snow map, purple indicates strong to severe thunderstorms in the area. The darker the color, the more precipitation is predicted. Light and dark blue usually represent snow, while dark red and purple signify heavy precipitation.
What are the different-colored roads on Google Maps?
On Google Maps, yellow roads denote main streets or roads, while orange signifies highways. Very light gray is used for normal areas such as houses and buildings, and green is used to indicate parks.
What are the 3 most important colors of road signs?
The three most important colors of road signs are red, white, and yellow. Red is used for stop, yield, and prohibition signs. White indicates regulatory signs, and yellow conveys general caution messages.
What are the 7 main types of traffic signs and their colors?
Traffic signs can be categorized into seven main types based on their colors and functions. Red indicates stop, yield, and prohibition signs. White is used for regulatory signs. Yellow is for general warning messages. Fluorescent yellow/green denotes pedestrian crossings and school zones. Orange is used for warning and guidance in roadway work zones. Coral is used for incident management signs.
What are the colors of the roads?
The colors of roads can vary depending on their markings. White lines are used for lane delineations, yellow lines represent no passing zones or temporary adjustments, and red is used for bus lanes, school zones, or particular areas of attention on the road.
What are the colors of traffic jams?
In the context of traffic jams, red is commonly used to display road segments with critical densities. These areas indicate heavy traffic delays, causing the speed of traffic to significantly slow down.
Why is Waze honking at me?
If Waze is making a honking sound, it could be an alert indicating that you are exceeding the speed limit. It serves as a reminder to reduce your speed and comply with traffic regulations.
What does orange mean on Google Maps?
On Google Maps, orange indicates middle-level traffic on your route. It signifies that there is moderate congestion, causing some delays, but traffic is still flowing at a reasonable pace.
What is the first thing you must do before turning right at a red light?
Before turning right at a red light, the first thing you must do is come to a complete stop. You can then proceed with the turn if there is no sign indicating “No Turn on Red” and after yielding to any pedestrians or vehicles already in the intersection.
What are the 6 types of pavement markings and markers?
The six main types of pavement markings and markers are pavement and curb markings, object markers, delineators, colored pavements, barricades, and channelizing devices. These markings and markers help guide and regulate traffic, improving safety and efficiency on the road.
